item.title: Fried Buldak
item.description: This recipe combines two of my favorite meals ever: fried chicken and Buldak, Korean fire chicken. It’s based on Serious Eat’s Buldak sauce and Quang Tran’s Sriracha Fried Chicken. This is the first recipe I (in part) created on my own that’s so good I’m confident enough to share it. ðŸ˜‰ If you like fried chicken and spicy food, you’re going to love this. Ingredients For one serving. Buldak sauce:
